art.author: andrew_cunningham
art.post: HE IS my Lord and I love Him!!! Words cannot express how ugly, but how beautiful God is.  According to Isaiah 53:2b “He hath no form nor comeliness; and when we shall see Him, there is no beauty that we should desire Him.” I am not gay.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
